mdRecord.dcterms:title: Tyler Family Papers, Group A
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Papers, 1716-1944, of the John Tyler family of "Sherwood Forest," Charles City County, Virginia. The collection contains correspondence, 1818-1862, of John Tyler concerning politics, War of 1812 claims, presidential election of 1840, land purchases in western Virginia, Kentucky and Illinois, "Sherwood Forest," business matters and his family. A great part of the collection consists of the papers of John Tyler's second wife, Julia Gardiner Tyler. Transcriptions for some of these materials have not been verified by library staff.
